name: T-Mobile Behold II™
description: The Behold® II is an Android phone with ideal features like corporate email synchronization, WiFi, and visual voicemail. Its Webkit-based browser is fully integrated with Google applications so you can check Gmail, automatically add an event to your calendar, and find directions with Google Maps. The Behold® II also features a 3.2” AMOLED screen so you can view your graphics, photos and YouTube videos in clarity. And it is everything you need for multimedia, offering 16GB of expandable memory, Bluetooth 2.1, MP3 music player and a 5MP camera/camcorder with auto-focus, flash and 8x zoom. It’s truly something to behold.

connectivity.cell:
EDGE  Quad band  850/900/1800/1900 MHz    
UMTS Dual-band 1700/2100 MHz 
HSDPA 7.2Mbps
